content.rendered:
Directed by Madhu Warrier

Written by Pramod Mohan

Star Rahul CB (Mathew. Saiju Kurup. Biju Menon. Anu Mohan. Deepti Sati. Kumar Sethu (Mahesh). Zarina Wahab. Manju Warrier

Language Malayalam

Producers Manju Warrier

Production Century Films. Manju Warrier Productions
